items.sentence: What's the fastest way to get to the zoo from here?
What's the difference between a stream and a river?
Don't forget that I have a lot more money than you.
I don't think Tom plays the guitar as well as Mary.
Tom became convinced that Mary no longer loved him.
Tom tried to comfort Mary by singing her a lullaby.
You better hope your boss doesn't get wind of this.
Mount Everest is the highest mountain in the world.
Tom walked over to Mary and handed her an envelope.
Remember to correct the typo in the French version.
